page.title: 16A Newcomer
page.content: Jim works as head groundsman at West Buckland School.He lives in the village less than a mile away.He has been here for 4 months and came from London.He came here because of the job and the work it involved. In a normal working day he would cut the cricket squares,clean the gym and pavilion,cut and mark the athletics track and make the front of the school look tidy. Compared to London the area is quieter and the behaviour of the children better but it is much wetter.He misses his friends but thinks it will be better for the family in N.Devon. During his free time he enjoys playing cricket and going to Taunton to watch his friend Ian Botham play cricket.
